nodes.text: Jetpack Troopers were specialized troopers of the Alliance to Restore the Republic that were equipped with jetpacks that allowed them to hurtle over walls and attack their targets head-on. The Jetpack Troopers were recruited among the most dauntless rebel soldiers.
Jetpack troopers appear in the 2014 mobile game Star Wars: Commander and are playable characters in the 2017 video game Star Wars Battlefront II.
